title: or i can change my region? bc i registred.. and dont chnage region... maybe you can help me?
body: or i can change my region? bc i registred.. and dont chnage region... maybe you can help me?

replies.body: Did you accidentally create your account in the wrong region?

You can purchase a region transfer in the store with 2600 RP in the **Account** section. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
